summary: REQ-4 appears to be implemented by updating the header logo Tailwind classes to reduce height (to h-10) and center it (block + mx-auto). The diff also includes changes to meta/tracking files (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt) that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json) with new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2) and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a Tailwind class change on the specific header logo in SiteHeader.tsx and did not request any project-state/metadata updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained a generated summary file of frontend files (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request generating or modifying documentation/summary files; it only scoped a single element change in SiteHeader.tsx.
